Name: Step By Step Hero
About the game: A Walking Simulator Adventure in a randomized world where every step counts! - Mind your steps! Your steps decrease as you go: make sure you grab stepping flowers and other items so you don't run out! - Explore the world of Omrand made of five distinct biomes! - Increase your Heart Points to defeat evil creatures and face your ultimate foe: the Heart of the Corruption! - Meet friendly NPCs that can help you on your travels! - Gather Coins to buy items and various things! - Discover secrets and take on side quests!
Meta Title: Step By Step Hero: Oct 24, 2022, PixelSlop and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Step By Step Hero? Check out the release date (Oct 24, 2022), developer insights from PixelSlop, and a complete game summary.
